abstract: Captured current AFM field state showing attractor count, field strength, and stability of the map.
description: Snapshot captured immediately after the latest Attractor Field Mapping (AFM) run. The result confirms a stable field with no bifurcations and balanced attractor distribution across the observed manifold. This entry tracks the raw metrics for downstream visualization and QA.
